paragraphs.name: 0b31
paragraphs.text: The point of money is to magnify you.

paragraphs.name: 0b31
paragraphs.text: The point of money is to magnify you.
Learn the basics. The worst thing would be to automate a process before you truly understand it. Big accidents tend to happen this way. Read the fine print once, then go.
paragraphs.name: 27b2

dabcbfe068b7.title: Money follows the path of least resistance.

paragraphs.text: Money follows the path of least resistance. And what I love about this article is you haven’t tried to sell us on one secret or a hack or tactic. You’ve simply laid out the infrastructure of someone who is likely to attract money. You’ve removed some resistance from the equation.

f5a6595e76dc.title: #6. I have to say this resonates with me.

paragraphs.text: #6. I have to say this resonates with me. I’ve seen people struggle with those closes to them; mainly family and friends. I’ve seen them let those close to them chip away at the individual’s dreams and goals, ultimately thwarting the person’s success and happiness. It’s bizarre, but it happens a lot.
